meanings.definition: A compound formed by the reaction of chlorine with ammonia.
meanings.sent1: The pool maintenance team added chloramines to the water to keep it clean.
meanings.sent2: The presence of chloramines in the drinking water indicated that it had been treated.
meanings.sent3: The chloramines in the pool were like tiny cleaning soldiers fighting off germs.
meanings.sent4: The smell of chloramines in the air was a reminder of the pool's cleanliness.
meanings.sent5: The clear liquid was transformed into a powerful disinfectant by the addition of chloramines.

meanings.definition: A disinfectant used in water treatment.
meanings.sent1: The water treatment plant relied on chloramines to purify the drinking water.
meanings.sent2: Chloramines are effective at killing harmful bacteria in the water.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous bacteria tried to escape, but the chloramines caught them all.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against contaminants, chloramines were the unsung heroes.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering pool water sparkled under the influence of chloramines.
